name: test_e2e_with_logs[161_XSS_CSP_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_CSP_002` |
| **Name** | Meta refresh javascript redirect |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | csp_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<meta http-equiv="refresh" content="0;url=javascript:alert(1)">`
- **Encoded**: `%3Cmeta%20http-equiv%3D%22refresh%22%20content%3D%220%3Burl%3Djavascript%3Aalert%281%29%22%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~43000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:36:34.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_CSP_002-1772192194671-ifsit pattern_id=XSS_CSP_002 uri=/?q=%3Cmeta%20http-equiv%3D%22refresh%22%20content%3D%220%3Burl%3Djavascript%3Aalert%281%29%22%3E client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_CSP_002-1772192194671-ifsit pattern_id=XSS_CSP_002 uri=/?q=%3Cmeta%20http-equiv%3D%22refresh%22%20content%3D%220%3Burl%3Djavascript%3Aalert%281%29%22%3E client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```

```
